import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { GET_ALL, GET_ID } from "../api/apiService"; import { useLocation, Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; const cardTextStyle = { maxWidth: "80%", }; const Content = ({ addToCart }) => { const [product, setProduct] = useState({}); const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(1); const handleAddToCart = () => { addToCart(product); navigate("/shopping/cart"); }; const location = useLocation(); const queryParams = new URLSearchParams(location.search); const productId = queryParams.get("productId"); useEffect(() => { GET_ALL(`products`).then((item) => setProducts(item.data)); GET_ID(`products`, productId).then((item) => setProduct(item.data)); }, [productId]); return (
  1. Home

  3. {product.title}

); }; export default Content;
